    public class InfantFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame

    • Method Detail

      • loadData

        public void loadData(java.lang.String directory,
                     java.lang.String infantID)
              throws java.io.IOException
        Load a new Infant. This method is declared as "synchronized" to ensure that only one thread is allowed to call it and other synchronized methods at once.
        Parameters:
        directory - Directory in which the infant data files (csv) are located
        infantID - ID of the infant to be loaded
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if an error occurs while reading the file

      • update

        public void update()
        Translate the selections made in the SelectionPanel into the configuration of the dataPanel This method is declared as "synchronized" to ensure that only one thread is allowed to call it and other synchronized methods at once. One of the challenges in implementing this method is that it can be called at any time. In particular, the structures that it is referencing may be in the process of being updated. So, we cannot assume that things like "selected values" are not actually set to something interesting or useful.

      • getDataPanel

        public InfantFrame.DataPanel getDataPanel()
        Return a reference to the data panel. FOR TESTING ONLY
        Returns:
        the data panel.
